EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-05-01-Indy 500 Raffle Send.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: We Want to Send You and a Friend to the 101st Indy 500! |Spend 30 Minutes with Turbonomic for a $100 Amazon Gift Card
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CKCKTV8?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=%5bmarketo_zs00ja7e8g_value%5d&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=%5bmarketo_ff0s7l5qls_value%5d&marketo_olh86f3r9s=%5bmarketo_olh86f3r9s_value%5d&marketo_day0sfb59s=%5bmarketo_day0sfb59s_value%5d&marketo_qqebotxyuo=%5bmark> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, What do Yankee Stadium, the Rose Bowl, the White House, Churchill Downs, the Colosseum, Liberty Island, the Taj Mahal, Vatican City and you have in common? It just so happens, you can all fit together inside the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. The difference here is, only you can be in attendance at the 101st Running of the Indy 500 on May 28th <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CKCKTV8?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=%5bmarketo_zs00ja7e8g_value%5d&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=%5bmarketo_ff0s7l5qls_value%5d&marketo_olh86f3r9s=%5bmarketo_olh86f3r9s_value%5d&marketo_day0sfb59s=%5bmarketo_day0sfb59s_value%5d&marketo_qqebotxyuo=%5bmark]]>! We want to send you and a friend to the Greatest Spectacle in Racing, and will be giving away 10 pairs of (2) Reserved Seating tickets to the first ten people to schedule a 30-minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer. And after those 10 pairs are gone, we will continue to give a pair of (2) General Admission tickets to everyone that schedules a meeting. Schedule Meeting Here <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CKCKTV8?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=%5bmarketo_zs00ja7e8g_value%5d&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=%5bmarketo_ff0s7l5qls_value%5d&marketo_olh86f3r9s=%5bmarketo_olh86f3r9s_value%5d&marketo_day0sfb59s=%5bmarketo_day0sfb59s_value%5d&marketo_qqebotxyuo=%5bmark]]> The Giveaway will end on Monday, May 15th, so make sure you fill out your submission today to get your seats for the Indy 500! <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CKCKTV8?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=%5bmarketo_zs00ja7e8g_value%5d&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=%5bmarketo_ff0s7l5qls_value%5d&marketo_olh86f3r9s=%5bmarketo_olh86f3r9s_value%5d&marketo_day0sfb59s=%5bmarketo_day0sfb59s_value%5d&marketo_qqebotxyuo=%5bmark]]> -The Turbonomic Team
